application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: I am applying for two trees to be removed. I believe that both tree's are sycamore species. The first tree labelled number 1. on the sketch plan is positioned in the REAR Garden on the fence boundary which is preventing fence panels being installed and securing the perimeter. The proposed works for this tree would need to be felled leaving a flat surface at ground level. The second tree, labelled number 2. on the sketch plan is positioned in the FRONT Garden on the fence boundary and is growing over the neighbours garden causing excessive shading to both properties. The proposed works for this tree would need to be felled leaving a flat surface at ground level.There is no proposal for planting replacement trees.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
